meanings.definition: A ruffle or flounce on a garment.
meanings.sent1: The dress had a beautiful furbelow at the hem.
meanings.sent2: She added a delicate furbelow to the collar of her shirt.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the furbelow on the curtain, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a furbelow of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The furbelow on the pillow made it look elegant and stylish.

meanings.definition: To decorate with ruffles or flounces.
meanings.sent1: She decided to furbelow her dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: He furbelowed the curtains to give them a more festive look.
meanings.sent3: The chef furbelowed the cake with colorful icing designs.
meanings.sent4: Her words furbelowed the conversation with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The artist furbelowed the painting with intricate details.
